Line.Chinese: 让我的心勇敢地展翅翱翔
Line.English: Let my heart bravely spread the wings

Line.Chinese: 飞掠黑夜去追寻明亮的月光
Line.English: Soaring past the night to trace the bright moonlight
Let the clouds heal me of the stings

Line.Chinese: 轻轻抹去我一生的伤痛
Line.English: Gently wipe the sorrow of my life I dream

Line.Chinese: 如果我动作再快一点的话，那傻丫头是不是就不用死了呢？
Line.English: If I act even faster, does that silly girl not have to die?
